Welcome.Title: Welcome to DuckovESP v2.7
Welcome.Subtitle: üéâ Major Update: Multi-language Support + Internationalized Interface!
Welcome.FixesDescription: This version introduces complete multi-language support and internationalized interface, now supporting Chinese, English, German, and more languages:
Welcome.Fix1: ‚úÖ Multi-language Support (v2.7 New) - Support Chinese, English, German, and more
Welcome.Fix2: ‚úÖ Automatic Language Detection - Auto-select language based on game settings
Welcome.Fix3: ‚úÖ Language Switcher Improved - Use dropdown menu to switch languages quickly (in config menu)
Welcome.Fix4: ‚úÖ Welcome Interface Localization - Fixed to display correct translated text instead of config keys
Welcome.Fix5: ‚úÖ Complete UI Internationalization - All menus, labels, tips support multi-language
Welcome.Fix6: ‚úÖ No Recoil Function (v2.6) - Eliminates all weapon recoil
Welcome.Fix7: ‚úÖ Headless Boss Detection (v2.6) - Works on headless enemies like Rampant Arcades
Welcome.Fix8: ‚úÖ Item Color System Optimized - Value colors integrate perfectly with other features
Welcome.Fix9: ‚úÖ Performance Optimization - Reduced object scanning calls by 96%
Welcome.Fix10: ‚úÖ Caching System - Significantly reduced CPU usage and memory pressure
Welcome.AboutDescription: DuckovESP is a powerful Duckov game assistance tool providing ESP transparency, aimbot, triggerbot, and many cheat functions for enhanced gameplay experience.
Welcome.Feature1: ‚Ä¢ ESP Transparency: Display enemy, item, and quest item locations and information
Welcome.Feature2: ‚Ä¢ Auto Aim: Intelligent head lock on enemies, automatic target tracking
Welcome.Feature3: ‚Ä¢ Auto Trigger: Automatically fire when target detected, bullet teleportation ignores walls
Welcome.Feature4: ‚Ä¢ No Recoil: Eliminate weapon recoil for stable shooting ‚≠ê New Feature
Welcome.Feature5: ‚Ä¢ Enemy List: Real-time display of all enemies' distance and status
Welcome.Feature6: ‚Ä¢ Cheat Functions: God mode, one-hit kill, speed boost, unlimited resources, etc.
Welcome.Feature7: ‚Ä¢ Configuration System: Customize parameters and hotkeys for all features
Welcome.HotkeyWarning: Note: All hotkeys require holding Shift to work!
Welcome.Tip1: 1. Use dropdown menu in configuration menu (Shift+F5) to quickly switch languages
Welcome.Tip2: 2. Language settings are auto-saved and automatically loaded on next startup
Welcome.Tip3: 3. All menus and tips support multi-language auto-display
Welcome.Tip4: 4. Auto aim and auto trigger must be enabled separately in configuration
Welcome.Tip5: 5. Auto trigger automatically disables in base for safety
Welcome.Tip6: 6. ESP rendering may affect performance; adjust rendering range as needed
Welcome.Tip7: 7. Recommended to use in single-player or private servers to avoid affecting other players
Welcome.DisclaimerText: This tool is for learning and research purposes only. Using this tool may violate game terms of service and may result in account ban. All consequences from using this tool are borne by the user; the author assumes no responsibility.
